hook.text: An AI cloned a CEO's voice and convinced an employee to wire $243,000 to a criminal's account.

buildup.text: Deepfake audio and AI-generated phishing emails are making attacks more convincing and harder to detect.

discovery.text: AI can generate thousands of unique phishing emails per hour, each tailored to the target's writing style.
